title: I am getting sick of this banning bull shit

AUTO BAN FOR THIS SHIT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
I have been in games where I was told to KYS { FYI Riot that means KILL YOUR SELF } I have been in games where I was told to stop fking little kids and focus on the game..
THEY ARE PLAYING RIGHT NOW!!!!! How do I know.. I have added them on my other account to make sure they were ban.

WTF RIOT... You allow others to get away MUCH MORE THEN THIS.. But ban for me less... GREAT SYSTEM!!
Your MMR is broken  your auto ban system is broken. 

But you point it out you get the moronic die hards saying " THE SYSTEM ISN'T BROKEN!! "

replies.body: It's so tempting to just rage at your teammates, however, you need to think. What good will it do? Do you ever see top players like faker and bjergsen doing that kind of stuff?

R U STUPID? 

Faker and Bjerg don't have trolls and feeders on their team!

> [{quoted}](name=trolledallmylife,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=qLJsBK9P,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-05-30T09:14:40.071+0000)
>
> R U STUPID? 
> 
> Faker and Bjerg don't have trolls and feeders on their team!

Everyone will come by a troll / toxic etc. player
You know what's funny, you keep saying others are toxic but you are the TOXIC ONE LOL!

Sure ..
You truthfully should write a book on the gems you offer the world in your wize comments...

But in all seriousness, what he said is true. Would you use that kind of talk to a stranger that you just met in the street? Or to your parents?

Instead of raging back, just mute any fools and report THEM after the game. Why bother talking to an idiot?
Also if you focus on improving your gameplay and dedicate 0 time to talking to bronzers, you'll get so much better at the game. There is a reason why you've been bronze for 3.5 seasons now. I'd say that wasting time typing is part of it.

[Watch this](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R8BtklaSWl0), if you wanna improve!
Maybe you should try focussing on the game rather then being a keyboard warrior.

Your game 1 was a complete disaster where literally every single line you'd said was either an direct insult or some kind of clear provocation. There is no dispute there.

Your game 2 was I guess average, but it probably got flagged because of the mummy insults that is entwined with comments on Ahri where the system probably confused between them and assumed that you were insulting someone's mum the entire game or something lol (but idk it's a guess), and the muting announcements (probably classified as negative attitude).

Your game 3 was pretty obvious. Target and continuous assault is not okay. I won't know if Yasuo was really toxic or whatnot, but if you pull out your gun, you're also in the wrong.

............

The ban is well deserved even with just game 1 and game 3 (personally I think game 2 isn't so bad). Even if you have to rage, put some thought into holding it back a little. Nothing too hard.

> [{quoted}](name=SEKAI,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=qLJsBK9P,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-05-27T19:17:26.892+0000)
> 
> The ban is well deserved even with just game 1 and game 3 (personally I think game 2 isn't so bad). Even if you have to rage, put some thought into holding it back a little. Nothing too hard.

I normally do. This is why I mute people. 
But come on.. 14 day ban for this crap.. 

I got people added on my other account that flat out said " stop fing little kids and focus on the game " and " How about you KYS you blk pedo " 
Sorry but saying " MORON " in my eyes with a FAIR SYSTEM.. 
Is less of a evil then being called black pedo and being told to kill myself.

Everyone rages.. Everyone forgets to mute them once and awhile. That is the case here. 
But from my understand you need 3 games of a " Toxic " chat log. 

This to me just saids.. We will ban you for anything and everything unless you talk using anagram. 

So from this point.. I am going to be toxic. I AM GOING TO TELL PEOPLE TO KILL THEMSELVES.. Sorry "KYS lsr " 
Because riot doesn't think nor care about the customers they have.

> [{quoted}](name=alsex,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=qLJsBK9P,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-05-27T22:43:41.889+0000)
> But come on.. 14 day ban for this crap.. 

Do you have previous ban history? If so, unless it's some time ago and your status is reverted back to normal otherwise your next punishment will just be 1 step beyond your last one.

> Everyone rages.. Everyone forgets to mute them once and awhile. That is the case here.
But from my understand you need 3 games of a " Toxic " chat log. 
>
>This to me just saids.. We will ban you for anything and everything unless you talk using anagram. 

Except that's just the 3 signature games where it thinks it exemplify your behaviour rather than being the sole 3 games you have. Everyone rages once in a while, that's true. But you have clearly crossed that line. That's just the Exhibit A, Exhibit B and Exhibit C of your case, but is by no means all of it.

> So from this point.. I am going to be toxic. I AM GOING TO TELL PEOPLE TO KILL THEMSELVES.. Sorry "KYS lsr " 

It's like you verbally assaulted a person and get sent to custody for it. But then your conclusion from the situation is not "oh I was wrong to assault others", but rather "I will assault more people because I'm arrested, there are worse criminals anyway and gov doesn't care".

I'm sorry, what.

You got banned because you're toxic, it's as simple as that. No need to try and pretend otherwise, and then use your very excuses as another excuse to be a toxic. That's disgusting.

> Because riot doesn't think nor care about the customers they have.

Oh, because Riot doesn't care that's why we have player behaviour policy and report system. Good one.

FYI, there is very little amount of hard criteria that the system looks for in the banning system, it's mostly a floating system where it bans people based on what people reports rather than having its own pre-set agenda imposed by its developers. In other words, you are not banned by Riot, you are banned for the most part, by the community.

It's not perfect, but Riot does care.

..................

**I will advise you, though: YOU NEXT PUNISHMENT FROM THIS (from 14 day ban) WILL BE A PERMA-BAN. So whatever do you from now on, stay low.**
Dude, you are in bronze for 4 years running, and you calling other people trash...Am gonna gues you like to start arguements quite regularly to get ban like this.
Ooooo Ty trolls. Glad you can see it is a bronze account. Your mother must be so happy she gave birth to an Einstein

You should stop playing this game an be a comedian!
